document.full_text: pakistan and the united states have agreed to resume joint intelligence operations against islamist militants, the pakistani foreign ministry said on friday, in a first step toward rebuilding trust between the two countries.
document.title: pakistan, u.s. agree to resume joint intel ops: foreign ministry
lines_and_colors: pakistan and the united states have agreed to resume joint intelligence operations against islamist militants, the pakistani foreign ministry said on friday, in a first step toward rebuilding trust between the two countries.
